welcome.text1: You are the living legacy of Your School. Your achievements inspire our current students and your continued connection strengthens our community.
welcome.text2: Whether you graduated last year or decades ago, this is your space to reconnect, share memories, mentor the next generation, and celebrate the journey that began here.

events.title: Batch Of 2025
events.description: Grand celebration with cultural night & awards

events.title: Alumni Mentorship Meet
events.description: Current students interact with successful alumni
